Content.Data: *OSX/Windows XP/Windows 7/Windows Server 2008 (any OS that runs Eclipse would work)\\ *Eclipse (32 and 64 bit versions are supported)\\ **Kepler (4.3.1) **Juno (4.2.2) **Indigo (3.7.2) //Note that other variations of these versions, such as Indigo 3.7.1, are also supported, however they have not been extensively tested// *Java, 1.7.x versions are supported. *Fortify Plugin
